Grammar:   DataElement 4.0
Namespace: shr.test

EntryElement:   BooleanConstraintOnValue
Description:    "It is an entry with a boolean constraint on the value"
Value:          boolean is true

EntryElement:   BooleanConstraintOnValueChild
Description:    "It is an entry with a boolean constraint on the value's child"
Value:          SimpleBoolean
                SimpleBoolean.boolean is false

EntryElement:   BooleanConstraintOnFieldChild
Description:    "It is a group entry with a boolean constraint on a field's child"
0..1            Simple
0..1            SimpleBoolean
                SimpleBoolean.boolean is true

Element:        SimpleBoolean
Value:          boolean

Element:        Simple
Value:          string
